obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_67_0: \E2* Yeah, yeah^1... It's been what^1, a day?/
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_69_0: \EH* Oh! That is^1... short^1, isn't it...?/
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_70_0: \E1* It's just that^1, I've never had friends before.../
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_71_0: \E2* So I've never waited so long to see them again, either!/
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_73_0: \EA* Fine^1, guess we'll TRY not to let you die of loneliness./
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_74_0: \E2* I bet Lancer wants to see us too^1, right?/%
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_134_0: \E2* Worry not^1, Susie^1. You'll see them in a moment./
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_138_0: \EK* (Hey^1, this better not be some kind of prank or something!)/%
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_153_0: \EA* (Kris^1, I have something to ask you.)/
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_154_0: \E3* (I need you to return to the Light World...)/
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_155_0: \EI* (And go to the old classroom^1, to the EAST of the closet doors.)/
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_157_0: \E2* (And bring it back here^1. Could you?)/%
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_216_0: \EP* Hell are you going^1? Trying to have cake without me?/%
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_218_0: * (Kris^1! I'll show you my castle later^1, ok?)/%
obj_ch2_scene4_slash_Step_0_gml_272_0: \E1* Hey^1, Kris^1, so where is every.../%
